author: RDIL
body:
Because of #8471 , we need to rename the `spelling` PipeLine as it is no longer just spelling, it now also checks to see if links works.  
@TravisEz13 said he would do it, but I figured I would open an issue so nobody forgets!

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I renamed the task to `PowerShell-CI-static-analysis` . We need to rename the YAML now.  @RDIL 	Would you mind submitting a PR just renaming it to something to match the new task and mentioning me in the PR?

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: @TravisEz13 okay.  Just the file name and all references?

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: Going to rename it to misc-analysis

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: yup... , that's fine.  No changes, because I cannot test changes to YAML and a rename in the same PR.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: At least without redoing the PR, myself (AzDevOps restrictions.)

comments.author: RDIL
comments.body: (can you assign me to this issue so I remember to fix this when I get home?) @TravisEz13

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I don't think you broke anything.  I'm looking at it.  But I assigned it to both of us.

title: [CI Tests] [Azure Pipelines] Rename spelling task
